name: CROP (C0r3)
description:
You play as a jellyfish stepping on platforms to progress. Don't think too much into it.

This is my first game, I know it has some things need polishing and could do for more levels. But, I slowly began to feel burnout near the end of the week and I'd rather show an un-polished game than nothing at all. 

tileset- https://opengameart.org/content/platformer-pack-16x16

music-https://opengameart.org/content/the-field-of-dreams

Jellyfish- me

sound effects: ambience-https://opengameart.org/content/dripping-water-loop
